name: Adventure: Fatty's Baskets
description:
Hello! I am a 15 year old Spanish developer, and, I just finished my first game after 2 years of development! :D
Adventure: Fatty's Baskets is a platform game but with the theme of healthy food. You must guide the protagonist through different levels to achieve the main objective!

You can visit our website: https://rabbitproductions.es/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3zsvPJNDDRwJl7tbabddbA/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/productionsrabbit/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RabbitProducti1
